story.headerCaption: Once, I accidentally came across an article about how you can even make a super-healthy fermented drink from pineapple peels at home. Armed with a sharp knife, clean bottles, pineapple, and enthusiasm, I got to work. And within three days, it was ready, a masterpiece of fermentation â€” Anakvass.

quality.cardDesc1: Anakvass doesn't contain artificial carbon dioxide.
quality.cardDesc2: We avoid thermal processing to preserve all the beneficial microorganisms.
quality.cardDesc3: Anakvass contains probiotics like Lactobacillus and other beneficial bacteria that promote gastrointestinal health.
quality.cardDesc4: We use only elite varieties of South American pineapples.
